Summary: three lights the shape of a norelco razor head two red one white
divs: Sighting Detailshovering just at cloud level over housing are just neighboring house area. I emailed the local ufo guy don't rmember his name and told him what I saw. Afterthat date in time i believe I was visited because I am a light sleeper and I believe I was returned by a short being in a robe with thick weave and it seemed to be light in my room but woke it was still dark. I have given most of my reports to the local ufo guy. this is notthe exact date time but it was fall to winter it was a tme when three of our planets could be seen all at once.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fort Knox
